title: Poster, "Yale Collegiate Chorus - Music of Ralph Vaughn Williams", ca. 1973
signed: Verso lower left on edge in ink: [illegible]
inscribed: Imprinted in purple upper right to lower left in red across page: O clap your hands / mass in g minor / five musical songs / william king, soloist [in red] / in italics: sunday / october 31 / 3:00 pm / battell chapel [in purple] / yale collegiate chorus / yale chamber singers / william harwood, conductor / greater new haven / youth emsemble / william harwood conductor [in red] / no / admission / charge [in purple]
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Poster design of five groups of purple and red san serif text placed from upper right to lower left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Yale Collegiate Chorus - Music of Ralph Vaughn Williams", ca. 1973.
ca. 1973. Screenprint on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-269.
